items.title: Point-in-Time Feature Store с Temporal Join Engine
items.mechanism: Point-in-Time Feature Store с Temporal Join Engine improves decision quality through deterministic implemented controls.

profit_hook.expected_effect: Improves risk-adjusted PnL decisions by tightening filters, sizing, and release confidence.

Metric cherry-picking that hides tail-risk degradation

Introduces regression in determinism or risk hard-stop gates
